title: This assignment tests you on  how to create and use array object in the java program.

questionText.text:
Given an array of ints, return true if the arrays of length are 1 or more, and the first element and the last element are equal.
sameFirstLast([1, 2, 3]) → false
sameFirstLast([1, 2, 3, 1]) → true
sameFirstLast([1, 2, 1]) → true
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
